title: Ep213 Chicken Nugget Crimes
description:
This week, the gals pluck through some disturbing fast food facts. Topics include unwanted ingredients, vegan mishaps, and some major HVAC consequences. Pour a glass of Winc's Copycat Chardonnay, double check your sauces, and tune in for Chicken Nugget Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
